maneuvers.name: △Strategic Ingenuity
maneuvers.description: Tactician can use their intelligence to gain the upper hand over the enemy.During the Initiative check, Tactician can optionally use as the standard value Tactician class +Intelligence modifier + 1.

maneuvers.name: △Solid Line
maneuvers.description: A Tactician can heal their allies, speeding up their next move.The Tactician can declare the use of this Maneuver once they have restored the current HP value of a Stratagem-applicable ally by 30 points or more, whether through casting a spell or a Combat Feat (if the damage is less than 30 HP because it went over the maximum, it doesn't count). Tactician accumulates Edge 1 point.This Maneuver can be used exceptionally, once per fulfillment of the conditions, ignoring the limit on the number of times it can be used.
maneuvers.prerequisite: When a Tactician restores 30 or more points of HP to an ally

maneuvers.name: △Sweeping Victory
maneuvers.description: When a Tactician defeats an enemy, their next plan is sped up.The Tactician can declare the use of this Maneuver when they have reduced an enemy Character's HP to 0 or less through a Melee Attack, Ranged Attack, or spell casting. The Tactician will accumulate 1 Edge point. This Maneuver can be used exceptionally, once per fulfillment of the conditions, ignoring the limit on the number of times it can be used.
maneuvers.prerequisite: When a Tactician reduces an enemy to 0 HP or less

maneuvers.name: ⏩Careful Guard II
maneuvers.description: The Tactician predicts all enemy attacks against them.For 10 seconds (1 round), when the Tactician receives physical or magical damage, that damage is reduced by 7 points. Note that Poison-, Disease-, or Curse-type damage cannot be reduced.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Resistance II
maneuvers.description: The Tactician can predict enemy magic and unique skills and prepare for them.For 10 seconds (1 round), the Tactician gains a +5 bonus to either their Fortitude or Willpower.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Concentration I
maneuvers.description: The Tactician uses a prepared incantation to increase their spell success rate.For 10 seconds (1 round), when the Tactician makes only one Spellcasting check, they gain a +1 bonus to the success value of the Spellcasting check. Once this bonus is applied, the effect disappears.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Efficiency II
maneuvers.description: The Tactician uses carefully prepared incantations to enhance the effects of their spells.For 10 seconds (1 round), the Tactician gains either +7 to magic damage or +7 to HP recovery from their own spells. If multiple targets are affected by the spell, this bonus is applied to any character among them. Once the bonus is applied, the effect disappears.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Unexpected Blow I
maneuvers.description: The Tactician demonstrates a strategy to take advantage of the enemy's weakness.For 10 seconds (1 round), when the Tactician makes a melee or ranged attack, they gain a +2 bonus to Accuracy checks and +2 points of physical damage dealt per attack. This effect is lost after one use.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Unexpected Blow II
maneuvers.description: The Tactician demonstrates a strategy to greatly take advantage of the enemy's weakness.For 10 seconds (1 round), when the Tactician makes a melee or ranged attack, they gain a +4 bonus to Accuracy checks and +4 points of physical damage dealt per attack. This effect is lost after one use.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Careful Guard I
maneuvers.description: The Tactician predicts all enemy attacks against them.For 10 seconds (1 round), when the Tactician receives physical or magical damage, the damage is reduced by 4 points. Note that Poison-, Disease-, or Curse-type damage cannot be reduced.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Foresight I
maneuvers.description: Tactician predicts enemy attacks.For 10 seconds (1 round), the Tactician gets a +3 bonus to their own Evasion checks.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Resistance I
maneuvers.description: The Tactician can predict enemy magic and unique skills and prepare for them.For 10 seconds (1 round), the Tactician gains a +3 bonus to either their Fortitude or Willpower.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Foresight II
maneuvers.description: The eTactician predicts attacks in greater depth.For 10 seconds (1 round), the Tactician gets a +5 bonus to their own Evasion checks.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Concentration II
maneuvers.description: The Tactician uses a prepared incantation to greatly increase their spell success rate.For 10 seconds (1 round), when the Tactician makes one Spellcasting check, they gain a +2 bonus to the success value of the Spellcasting check. Once this bonus is applied, the effect disappears.

maneuvers.name: ⏩Efficiency I
maneuvers.description: The Tactician uses a prepared incantation to enhance a spell's effect.For 10 seconds (1 round), the Tactician deals +4 damage or adds +4 to HP recovery to one target of a spell cast by the Tactician. If the spell has more than one target, the Tactician can choose which target to apply the bonus to. Once the bonus is applied, the effect disappears.
